title: Elliptic Integrable Systems and Special Functions
abstract:
We discuss elliptic quantum Calogero-Moser-Sutherland models, including their
relativistic generalizations due to Ruijsenaars and van Diejen, and the
relations of these models to classes of special functions developed and
explored in recent and on-going research efforts. We give an introduction to
these models and corresponding special functions aimed at non-experts. We also
describe a few open problems in the field.
